column4: Question : how to install xubuntu with cd rom boot up but from the internet?
what do you mean from the internet?
something like installing from windows when it boots up the installer and everything else downloads from repos online
not sure if i understand... do you want the install disk to install less packages?

i was about to send you there lol
i was looking and looking and finally thought i was dumb like shit ... because i allready done it once but couldnt remember the name ...
cyber: try sending me an IM now
it should have told you "yes you are now registered blah blah blah your password is" "blah"" did you get that message back?
